message: Let's start with a fair split. Accept and we can end the game early.
I think a more even split is fairer. Let's move closer to 50/50. If we keep rejecting offers, the money will be worth less for both of us.
I'm not willing to give up 15 dollars. I'll make a counteroffer: 60 for me and 40 for you.
I'm sticking to my previous counteroffer. Let's end this before the value drops further.
